Cathedral_City.KGAM (AM):
KGAM was a commercial radio station in Palm Springs, California, broadcasting on 1450 AM. The frequency is now used for KCOD.
KGAM aired talk programming. KGAM, along with KDES-FM, KWXY, and KPSI AM and FM, was licensed to R & R Radio Corporation which was owned by the Rozene R. Supple Trust.
KGAM aired a wide range of talk shows, from Michael Savage and Dennis Miller to Dave Ramsey.
